TestCase.Discription:
Platform to support Battery Identification and Authentication.
Usage:
--Platform to have a mechanism to identify the connected battery as valid by digital battery identification or analog method.
--Platform to populate the charging profiles depending on the analog or digital battery identification.
--Platform to support multiple identification methadology.
--Platform to use standard protocols to interact with the digital battery.
--Platform to have a capability to read the charging profile from Digital battery.
--Platform to ensure to prevent the battery hot-swap.
